title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were previously accessed and appeared in the File menu's Most Recently Used (MRU) list are not persisting between sessions.
EB: The files that were previously accessed should appear in the File menu's MRU list even after restarting the application.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Access and open several files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application and check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously accessed files are listed.
